>> x = linspace(0,1,50);
>> f = @(x) cos(4*x)

>> b = f(x);
>> A = [];
>> for i = 0:10
        y = x.^i;
        A = [A y'];
    end

>> c = A\b'

c =

   1.000000038120647
  -0.000012132618937
  -7.999528596502270
  -0.007137816703811
  10.722601995909741
  -0.257549358411933
  -4.946643811578490
  -1.373303866928413
   3.243340066641667
  -1.145391639738877
   0.109981465124875
